idea:
“SVK ENGINEERING” has gained trust in the field of MEP Services - Consultancy and Contracting.

We are a professionally managed company with experienced technician’s as well specialized skill set personnel's expertise and site engineers as part of the core team to offer efficient & economical design build engineering solutions to our customers.

We started off with, and established ourselves in, the domain of MEP Services - Consultancy and Contracting (Mechanical, Electrical & LV System Plumbing and IBMS).

We shall be extremely pleased to receive your enquiries which shall receive our prompt attention.
name: SVK ENGINEERING

idea: Zlen is a next-generation application where social media meets private messenger, giving the user the best of both worlds, without any of the drawbacks. Zlen lets you create your private social bubble with your closest friends. A unique Zlen Code protects prevents unwanted people from accessing and lurking around your profile. Without your Zlen Code, no one can search for you on the app or add you, unlike other social media apps where your name, number, or email ID is enough to find you. Through Zlen you connect with those you actually want to without the social pressures & obligations.
name: Zlen

idea:
Oktobuzz Digital Solutions Pvt Ltd, founded by Hemal Majithia and Neha Majithia, is a digital communication agency focused on creating meaningful and effective digital campaigns that accelerate a brand’s growth. The agency’s mission is to be their clients’ digital companion and help businesses grow proactively. An impact-driven approach is the core of all their brand solutions, which stems from their belief that ‘When the client wins, we win. When the client grows, we grow.’

Oktobuzz delivers the full spectrum of digital marketing services, including Insight-led Brand Consultancy, Business objective focused Digital Solution Consultancy, Goal-based Social Media Marketing, ROI-led Performance Marketing Campaigns, Search Engine Optimization, Data-driven Website Design, UX/UI design and Development, Result-oriented Video Production, Book marketing services, Reach Influencer Marketing, Meaningful and engaging Podcasts as well as Innovations through Augmented and Virtual Reality.
name: Oktobuzz Digital Solutions Private Limited
